Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kostner
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kostner, Cermak, Pulaski and 26th due to street blockage near 26th and Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kostner, Cermak, Pulaski and 26th, due to street blockage near 26th and Kostner.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Oakley
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted WB: Harrison, Damen, Van Buren, Western and Harrison; EB: Harrison, Western, Jackson, Damen and Harrison due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Harrison and Oakley due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Damen, Van Buren, Western and Harrison.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Damen and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.
